findings.title: Uncommented code
findings.description: The contract lacks comments, which is a good practice to follow.

findings.title: Lack of require statement in function arguments
findings.description: Function arguments must be checked with require statement in every function.

findings.title: Unsafe mathematical operations without SafeMath library functions
findings.description: The contract performs mathematical operations without using SafeMath library functions, which can lead to integer overflow and underflow.

findings.title: Unnecessary sub operation in total supply function
findings.description: The highlighted sub operation _totalSupply.sub(balances[address(0)]) can be safely removed.

findings.title: Integer OverFlow and Underflow
findings.description: Integer OverFlow and Underflow can be done.

findings.title: MintToken() function allows negative tokens
findings.description: Test case failing to revert when owner sends negative tokens to mintToken() function.

findings.title: Transfer function allows 0 tokens
findings.description: Test case failing to revert when someone sends 0 tokens in transfer functions.
